entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tests in runtime can't target older version of .NET #103180
  • Disabling Blazor SIMD support breaks published app during runtime #103178
  • coreCLR fails to build on Windows arm64 machine #103175
  • Support W3C Baggage propagation without Activity #103174
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103170
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: bool System.Reflection.MetadataReader.TryGetString(StringHandle handle, Span<char> span, out int length); #103169
  • [API Proposal]: System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReader.GetDocId(EntityHandle) #103168
  • Crossgen2 fails with NullReferenceException in Internal.IL.EcmaMethodIL.GetExceptionRegions #103162
  • DataRows SetModified and SetAdded is not the same between the code and the document #103157
  • StackFrame.ToString has different formatting on native AOT #103156
    Future
  • `IndexOutOfRangeException` serializing large strings #103155
    Future
  • System.IO.Pipelines issue: Ureleased memory after reader.Complete #103149
  • Critically important services in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #103147

Closed

  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes severe memory spike on Android #102406
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement `ISpanFormattable` on `string` #103176
  • Improving support in .NET for W3C Baggage standard #103172
  • No way to set the .NET entry assembly from unmanaged host? Also, documentation seems to be wrong/unclear. #94139
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IEnumerable, IReadOnlyCollection and IReadOnlyList for {RO}Span and {RO}Memory #103164
  • ILLink analyzer tests - improve ref assembly acquisition #80504
    9.0.0
  • ILVerify.Program.Resolve throws NullReferenceException if missing DLL (regression) #103154
  • [wasm][wasi] No main function should be required when building a library #96869
    9.0.0
  • Excluding a library from interpreter would result in a crash #99248
    9.0.0
  • Large unmanaged memory growth (leak?) when upgrading from .NET 6 to 8 #95922
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #100299
    9.0.0
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` to represent Swift structs and enums in C# #100543
    9.0.0
  • Support not using Win32 APIs that aren't allowed for Microsoft Store UWP apps & games on NativeAOT #96510
    Future
  • error MSB3971: The reference assemblies for ".NETFramework,Version=v8.0" were not found #103059

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for invalid trim annotations in top-level method #103182
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Enable downwards optimization for multi-exit loops #103181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Testing] CET pipeline #103179
  • Bring back JIT support for core Vector64/128/256/512 APIs #103177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CET - remove writing to shadow stack #103171
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adding latency numbers for serialize instruction. #103167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove cached cgroup values (#102971) #103166
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add MIT license header to DotnetProxyTrustManager.java #103165
    area-System.Security
  • ConfigXmlReader is an IDisposable; Dispose it #103163
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Attempt to fix DuplicateAndClose_TcpServerHandler flaky test #103161
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector #103159
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix sending ICMP echo request when host is unreachable #103158
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Run System.Diagnostics.StackTrace tests with NAOT #103151
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable escape analysis and use in vn #103148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Tensor validations, scope changes, and TensorPrimitives methods #103005
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Re-write Android PBKDF2 one shot in Java #103016
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Propagate the exception from last retry #102974
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove vestigial HAVE_LARGE_SNPRINTF_SUPPORT checks #103106
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix typo in log message. #103036
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #103118
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Add net current to current names to make them match in net10 #103050
    area-Workloads
  • Set proper options for connected IPv6 raw socket #103127
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Minor cleanup of the Vector64/128/256/512 implementations to improve fallbacks #103095
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add Base64Fuzzer to the repo #103011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Fix ArgIteratorTemplate::GetNextOffset() for struct{Arr[], float} #103125
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Disable HAS_MORE_THAN_64_REGISTERS until we add complete support #103146
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x

Updated

  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    needs-area-label
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2469101 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Introduce IBufferedLogRecord #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse and box+isinst+unbox.any patterns up front #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0
  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocation in HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode. #102909
    community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #103006
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Allow TypePreserve info to be applied multiple times #103140
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Start running pri1 tests on native AOT #103069
    needs-area-label
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE `Prefetch*` APIs. #103094
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some failed CoreRoot R2R testcases. #103033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
